entities.name: Harry
entities.description: One of the main characters, a young wizard who is recognized by Stan Shunpike.

entities.name: Ron
entities.description: One of Harry's friends, who claims to have invented a broomstick that can reach Jupiter.

entities.name: Hermione
entities.description: One of Harry's friends, who helps to calm Ron down and march him away from the veela.

entities.name: Stan Shunpike
entities.description: A conductor on the triple-decker Knight Bus, who recognizes Harry and is about to become a Minister of Magic.

entities.name: veela
entities.description: A group of magical creatures that are admired by Stan Shunpike and his friends.

entities.name: Leaky Cauldron
entities.description: A place where Harry works as a dishwasher, mentioned in the conversation between Harry and his friend.

entities.name: Jupiter
entities.description: A planet that Ron claims to have invented a broomstick that can reach.

relationships.description: Harry is recognized by Stan Shunpike, who knows him as a young wizard.
Ron claims to have invented a broomstick that can reach Jupiter.
Hermione helps to calm Ron down and march him away from the veela.
